story.synopsys: In the distant year of 3512, under the haunting glow of a celestial Eclipse, darkness shrouds the city of Veridian. A puzzling murder has sent shockwaves through the technological metropolis, leaving its inhabitants gripped with fear and suspicion. The victim, an esteemed scientist known for pushing the boundaries of intergalactic advancements, met a grisly end within the confines of his state-of-the-art laboratory. As the sun's vibrant radiance fades behind the moon, a myriad of secrets, deceit, and hidden alliances come to the forefront, turning the once peaceful city into a labyrinth of unanswered questions. With the complexity of investigative technology far surpassing our current comprehension, it is up to a fearless detective and their sentient AI partner to navigate this futuristic world in search of the truth, relentlessly pursuing justice before the Eclipse recedes and darkness descends once more upon Veridian.

background.backstory: Luna Eclipse, a renowned astrologer, was born under a rare celestial event. Her mysterious birth during a solar eclipse bestowed her with an innate ability to decipher the cosmos. Growing up, Luna delved into the secrets of ancient prophecies and studied the art of astrology. Gradually, she became a trusted advisor to many influential people within the futuristic cityscape of 3512. Her enigmatic aura and uncanny accuracy in predicting the future made her the go-to person for any profound cosmic insights.
background.bias: Given her deep connection with celestial bodies, Luna tended to view events through an otherworldly lens. She often believed that planetary alignments held significant sway over human destinies, sometimes to the point of obscurity. However, her esoteric perspective granted her a unique perspective on the world's happenings, allowing her to unravel mysteries that often eluded others.
